name: Just Dance 2015
summary: Just Dance 2015 (also known as Just Dance 6) is the sixth game in the Just Dance series developed by Ubisoft Paris and Ubisoft Milan and published by Ubisoft. It was officially announced at Ubisoft's Electronic Entertainment Expo 2014 press event on 9 June 2014 alongside with Just Dance Now. It was released on 21 October 2014 in North America, 23 October in Europe, 24 October in the UK and 25 October in Asia.
